   sphinx-quickstart on Mon Dec  4 11:58:09 2017.
   You can adapt this file completely to your liking, but it should at least
   contain the root `toctree` directive.

Back up
=============

Back up is meant to storage the back up of all daily work in
cluster and nbdcalc machine

The current space is:

    - Capacity: 7T
    - Occupied : 5.5T  
    - Available: 1.5T 
    - Usage : 80%

Under **/home/<user_name>** each user has his own private folder
